question:
India and ADB has signed an agreement for a 200 million USD loan for improving rural Maharashtra. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It will fund the Maharashtra Rural Connectivity Improvement Project.
  2. It will fund the Maharashtra Project on Climate Resilient Agriculture.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Asian Development bank will fund the rural connectivity project in Maharashtra. The aim of the project is to upgrade existing roads to all-weather roads in 34 districts. The project will cover roads for a stretch of about 2,100km. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Maharashtra Project on Climate Resilient Agriculture is being funded by the World Bank. This is aimed at small holder farmers in the state. It will improve the adaptive capacity to improve productivity and resilience against climate events as well as improving post-harvest technology.
